alert.note: Alert for Polk (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 26 at 8:34AM CDT until June 28 at 8:30AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... Red Lake River at Crookston affecting Polk County. .The Red Lake River at Crookston has crested. River height will continue to fall over the next few days. No significant precipitation is expected. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Red Lake River at Crookston. * WHEN...Until Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, MINOR FLOOD STAGE. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 15.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:45 AM CDT Sunday was 15.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 10.0 feet Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
